<tab><white>When hunting a monster,
<green>click once <white>on the monster to
begin attacking.
Lifeguard_DeenG:
<tab><white>[Monster Quests];
To complete a [Monster Quest], You will need to Hunt the amount of monsters shown in the allotted time.
Please hunt 5 Tottochi.
TinnieE: <tab><white>[Monster Quests]; To complete a [Monster Quest], You will need to Hunt the amount of monsters shown in the allotted time. Please hunt 5 Bad Fury.
Lifeguard_BeanE: <tab><white>Congratulations! You have completed Scenario Quest Chapter 1. Equip the <green>Pocket Pouch<white> and Speak with <green>Lifeguard Bean<white> again.
Lifeguard_BeanI: <tab><white>There are many people in [Coral Beach Field 3] that are looking for help. Why don't you try helping <green>Treasure Hunter Reina, Hunter Girl Yuri, and Monkey_T.<white>
Explorer_ReinaD: <tab><white>Use your <green>Quick Slots<white> to register <green>Potions and Skills<white> for fast access during combat.
Driller_MarkyC: <tab><white>Watch and learn about how to drill from <green>Driller Marky<white>. Press the <green>[D]<white> key and left click to start drilling.
Don_GiuvanniH: <tab><white>NPCs with a Wing Icon will teleport you to different places. If you want to go to a distant area, speak with Kochi and Pachi who both have Wing Icons
